com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal.CheckerLocalTime

com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal
 

  • Uses of CheckerLocalTime in com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal

    Subclasses with type arguments of type CheckerLocalTime in com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CheckerLocalTime
    A specialized checker for LocalTime instances, providing fluent API methods to assert temporal properties such as being before/after another time, inclusivity checks, range validations, and whether a time lies in the past or future relative to the system clock.
    Classes in com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal that implement interfaces with type arguments of type CheckerLocalTime
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CheckerLocalTime
    A specialized checker for LocalTime instances, providing fluent API methods to assert temporal properties such as being before/after another time, inclusivity checks, range validations, and whether a time lies in the past or future relative to the system clock.
    Methods in com.luchersol.core.specialized_checkers.time.temporal that return CheckerLocalTime
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.check(LocalTime localtime)
    Creates a new CheckerLocalTime instance for the given local time with a default name.
    static CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.check(LocalTime localtime, String name)
    Creates a new CheckerLocalTime instance for the given local time and name.
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.inRange(LocalTime date_1, LocalTime date_2)
    Checks if the local time is within the specified range (exclusive).
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isAfter(LocalTime date)
    Checks if the local time is after the specified time.
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isAfterOrEqual(LocalTime date)
    Checks if the local time is after or equal to the specified time.
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isBefore(LocalTime date)
    Checks if the local time is before the specified time.
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isBeforeOrEqual(LocalTime date)
    Checks if the local time is before or equal to the specified time.
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isFuture()
    Checks if the local time is in the future (after the current time).
    CheckerLocalTime
    CheckerLocalTime.isPast()
    Checks if the local time is in the past (before the current time).

    CheckerLocalTime.self()
    Returns this instance (for fluent API usage).
